code_message: Task, acquisition or run entities detected in coordsystem.tsv. Coordinate systems should generally not vary within a session. Consider removing the excess entity/entities or create new sessions when multiple coordinate systems are appropriate.

Task, acquisition or run entities detected in electrodes.tsv. Electrode definitions should generally not vary within a session. Consider removing the excess entity/entities or create a new session each time electrodes are reconfigured.
